name: Read More Copy Link
author: Eliott Robson

sections.description:
This plugin is for WordPress, it adds a dashboard menu. Once you have activated the plugin it will automatically alter copied text of the main website using settings in the dashboard. Including copy altering for:

  • Copyright information
  • Restricting amount

Donations

If you want to support the plugin head over to: Stormation where you can comment about the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder Read More Copy Link to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Change the settings in the dashboard
sections.faq:
It’s not loading, what’s wrong?

Firstly, this is only for WordPress . Check you have this installed correctly. Then, check you have activated the plugin.

The best way to get issues resolved is to head to the plugin page, and comment!
